minersadvantage.hungry: You are too hungry to use
minersadvantage.client.disable_particle_: Disable Particle Effects generated during block harvesting.
minersadvantage.server.override_client.c: When enabled, the Server side enabled features will take precedence over the Client config.  Meaning the MinersAdvantage features that are disabled within the Server config will be disabled for all Players regardless of their Client side configs.
When enabled, the Server side feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_common_se: When enabled, the Server side Common feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_captivati: When enabled, the Server side Captivation feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_cropinati: When enabled, the Server side Cropination feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_excavatio: When enabled, the Server side Excavation feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_pathanati: When enabled, the Server side Pathanation feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_illuminat: When enabled, the Server side Illumination feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_lumbinati: When enabled, the Server side Lumbination feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_shaftanat: When enabled, the Server side Shaftanation feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_substitut: When enabled, the Server side Substitution feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.server.enforce_veination: When enabled, the Server side Veination feature settings will be enforced upon all Players connected to the server.
minersadvantage.common.tps_guard.comment: The TPS (Ticks per Second) Guard can be used to help reduce block ghosting [Default = true]
minersadvantage.common.gather_drops.comm: Gathers all dropped items to the position of the first block hit.
minersadvantage.common.auto_illum.commen: Automatically Illuminate dark areas, if Illumination is enabled, while using Excavation, Shaftanation or Veination.
minersadvantage.common.mine_veins.commen: Automatically mine a vein of ore, if the Veination mod is enabled, while using Excavation, Shaftanation or Veination.
minersadvantage.common.blocks_per_tick.c: The number of blocks that will be broken per tick. Default is 1, but the faster it is, the more likely that Minecraft will crash due to being unable to keep up.
minersadvantage.common.enable_tick_delay: Enable/Disable the Blocks per Tick delay.
minersadvantage.common.tick_delay.commen: The number of Ticks that will be ignored before the next block is harvested.
minersadvantage.common.radius.comment: The Radius of blocks to check for connected blocks.
minersadvantage.common.limit.comment: The Maximum number of blocks allowed to be mined.
minersadvantage.common.break_at_tool_spe: Breaks blocks at the speed of the tool being used.
minersadvantage.captivation.allow_in_gui: Allows/Disallows Captivation to pick up items while in an in-game GUI.
minersadvantage.captivation.h_radius.com: The Radius of Horizontal blocks to check for items.
minersadvantage.captivation.v_radius.com: The Radius of Vertical blocks to check for items.
minersadvantage.captivation.is_whitelist: If 'true' Captivation will only pickup items in the blacklist. If False, Captivation will pick up all items except those in the blacklist.
minersadvantage.captivation.unconditiona: If 'true' Captivation will NEVER allow items in the blacklist to be picked up, even when walking over them.
minersadvantage.cropination.harvest_seed: Tells Cropination to havest the seeds along with the Crop.
minersadvantage.excavation.toggle_mode.c: Enable/Disable Excavation Toggle Mode.  When Enabled, pressing the Excavation keybindings will act as ON/OFF toggle switchs.  A notification message will be shown in chat to let you know if the Toggle is ON or OFF.
minersadvantage.excavation.ignore_varian: Ignore Block Variations, like stone/granite/andesite/diorite, when using Excavation.
minersadvantage.excavation.is_block_whit: If 'true' Excavation will only work when harvesting Blocks within the Blacklist.
minersadvantage.excavation.block_blackli: List of blacklisted Block IDs. Default is empty.
minersadvantage.illumination.use_block_l: Use the Block light level to detect the Lowest Level of light.  If disabled the Sky light level will be used, which takes the time of day into account.
minersadvantage.illumination.light_level: The Lowest Level of light allowed before a torch is placed.
minersadvantage.lumbination.chop_below.c: Chops any part of the Tree below the block being destroyed.
minersadvantage.lumbination.destroy_leav: Destroy the leaves when chopping down a tree?
minersadvantage.lumbination.leaves_affec: If 'true' leaves will use your tools durability. If 'false' leaves with be destroyed without using a tool.
minersadvantage.lumbination.replant_sapl: If 'true' and saplings for the tree being harvested are avalible in the players inventory, they tree will be replanted.
minersadvantage.lumbination.use_shears.c: If the player has shears on their hot bar, they will be used to harvest the leaves of the tree being harvested.
minersadvantage.lumbination.leaf_range.c: The block range to check for leaves.
The block range to check for the tree Trunk width.
minersadvantage.pathanation.path_width.c: How wide to make the Path.
How long to make the path.
minersadvantage.shaftanation.shaft_l.com: The number of blocks long the shaft should be.
minersadvantage.shaftanation.shaft_h.com: The number of blocks high the shaft should be.
minersadvantage.shaftanation.shaft_w.com: The number of blocks wide the shaft should be.
minersadvantage.shaftanation.torch_place: Where torches should be placed when Auto Illumination is enabled:  Floor (default), L_Wall or R_Wall (2 blocks up from shaft floor).
If 'true' will switch back to the previously selected item.
minersadvantage.substitution.favour_silk: Favour a SilkTouch tool over any other tool.
minersadvantage.substitution.favour_fort: Favour a Fortune tool over any other tool.
minersadvantage.substitution.ignore_vali: Ignore other tools when deciding to substitute if the current Tool is valid for the block.
minersadvantage.substitution.ignore_pass: Ignore Passive Mobs when deciding to substitute to a weapon.
minersadvantage.substitution.blacklist.c: List of blacklisted Tool IDs. Default is empty.
